H0.text: An earthquake is what happened when two of Earth's plates pushed together and the ground moved.

H1.text: A landslide occurred when two of Earth's plates pushed together and the ground moved.

H2.text: A volcano is what happened when two of Earth's plates pushed together and the ground moved.

H3.text: An avalanche is what happened when two of Earth's plates pushed together and the ground moved.

A4.text: Tectonic earthquakes occur anywhere on the earth where there is sufficient stored elastic strain energy to drive fracture propagation along a fault plane.
